review_body: This hotel has a great location and it is walkable just across the street to the beach. It is surrounded by many restaurants and they are also easy access. The hotel is beautiful inside and all of the staff were very kind and accommodating. We had a wonderful stay as we celebrated my husband's 60th birthday. So that'll give them the

I stayed here for a week. Very good location, great staff and amazing views. A few of the restaurants we good+. My room with a view of the beach and the large gallery were a big plus. Views of the beach and Diamond Head made for amazing sun rises and sunsets.

The Waikiki Beach Marriott had everything I needed. My check-in experience with Janeen was great and I loved that she was so patient with me when I forgot one of my documents. The hotel has 1300 rooms, but throughout the stay I didn't feel like I was staying in a busy/large hotel. The lobby is great for lounging. I also love that they provide reusable water bottles for the re-fill station in the lobby. Also thank you to Skai, who sent up some goodies for me and my boyfriend's birthdays.
